name: SoulEscape (Kuhaku Pixel, Milicen)
description:
You are playing as a soul who can freely teleport between puppets.

Your objective is to fix the generator and escape the room. The room has a monster that can seal the puppets. Once alll 4 puppets have been sealed, then you lose.

WASD - move character

G - interact with generator

F-Put down flare that can distract the monster

1234 - change puppets

Team Members:

-https://github.com/ArkynGenics
-https://github.com/milicen
